sentences.sContent: Which is better to incinerate the rubbish from our towns or to tip it into disused quarries?
sentences.sContent_eng: Which is better to incinerate the rubbish from our towns or to tip it into disused quarries?
sentences.sCn: 在我们城里把垃圾予以焚化，还是倒进废弃的采石坑，哪一种方法好？

remMethod.val: in + ciner(灰) + ate(使…) → 使成灰 → 焚化， 焚毁
